May 8, 1994 D Weston-super-Mare (Second Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-second-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium of Sandwell. Prizes- 1st £130, 2nd £100, 3rd £60. 5 bands competd.
